resources.string: This game is played by 2 people. The goal of the game is to make a string of letters that is the start of a word, but not a whole word with 4 or more letters. The players first enter their names. After this, the players can take turns in entering one letter. As said before, the string of letters always have to be a possible beginning of a word, but not a whole word with 4 or more letters. The game can be played with either a Dutch or English lexicon. If the string is 4 letters long when the game ends, the winner wins 4 points.
